channel.title: Comments on: “It Is More Complicated Than You Think”
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description:
:) thanks.
My favorite is the "evil bit" April 1st RFC: http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3514.txt Some people thought it was real and said that evil people can set the evil bit to false.
item.content:encoded:
:) thanks.

My favorite is the “evil bit” April 1st RFC:
http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3514.txt
Some people thought it was real and said that evil people can set the evil bit to false.

item.title: By: sveta the great
item.dc:creator: sveta the great
item.description:
Welcome to the RFC world:)
my favorite is: http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2549.txt
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/April_1_RFC
item.content:encoded:
